entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 8:05 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 8:05 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
